text: iZombie star Robert Buckley and Feast actress Jenny Wade are now man and wife. Posting to Instagram from the Thai island Koh Samui, the couple surprised their fans by announcing this Saturday that they had recently gotten married. Robert, 37, uploaded a snapshot of himself and his wife with frosting - smeared faces, captioning :'Post - cake fight with ( Borat voice ) MY WIIIIIFE.'Scroll down for video Cake - smeared : iZombie star Robert Buckley and Feast actress Jenny Wade are now man and wife, as they announced on Instagram from Thailand this Saturday Jenny, also 37, included the same photo in a three - entry Instagram album she posted from their cake - fueled Southeast Asian holiday.
